授業目的:
To enhance students' ability in critical analysis on regional approach and transnational policy framework for socio-economic and spatial development.
Students learn the concepts and skills to analyze regional development issues and policies in this course.
THE COURSE WILL BE HELD FACE-to-FACE. But it might take the ON-DEMAND Learning. Please Check with the LUNA
到達目標:
Specific case studies on Urban Infrastructure in Europe and Asia will be illustrated, discussed and analyzed by students
- that Students can make critical assessment / recommendation for development policy national, regional and international bodies (like the UN programs).  Students can analyze regional development issues and policies in this course

評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note

Each student must demonstrate the learning from, as well as beyond, taught lessons and extra-curricular activity (homework and field observation) - Final Repot with firstly: 3 Reviews (each 800-word) on literature review and media (video-documentary) and more importantly, Mini-Project Report (4000 words) - compatible with academic / policy paper standard. Additional Oral (in class or online discussions) examination might be conducted. Interactive Reflexive Review-Learning. 
Oral Examination / Report Presentation might be conducted to check the written works.
Active Participation: Research and Presentation of Findings from Classes, Policy Review, and Others (Intensive Classes)
ORAL Test and Examination in ENGLISH might be taken to Assess Student's Learning and their Notes. All Assessment will be completed at the end of the Last Class - Submission of Final Report is a Must for On-Demand Online Learning.
 Additional Oral (in class or online discussions) examination might be conducted.
Students might be asked to revise and re-submit the Report and Notes of Learning.
Class Performance, Written Submission of Notes and Papers, and Final Report will be used to assess for the Final Grade. Assessment
